title: Google touts ‘quarterly sales record’ for Pixel phones after 6 & 6 Pro launch
content:
Google this afternoon reported its Q4 2021 and fiscal year earnings. Right off the bat, CEO Sundar Pichai touted a “quarterly sales record for [its] Pixel phones, despite supply constraints.”

more…

The post Google touts ‘quarterly sales record’ for Pixel phones after 6 & 6 Pro launch appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google and Alphabet CEO Sundar Pichai touted a "quarterly sales record for [its] Pixel phones despite supply constraints."
